summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a rugged, mountainous environment with rocky cliffs and sparse vegetation. The player character, seen from behind, is holding a staff and appears to be preparing for an encounter. To the left, an enemy creature is visible, suggesting an imminent confrontation. The user interface includes a health bar at the bottom left, along with various icons indicating available abilities or items. Additional UI elements are present at the bottom right, possibly showing more abilities or status effects. The setting and character posture suggest a focus on exploration and combat within the game.
